name: Gun Breaker - 3D Gun Games
description:
Gun Breaker is a single-tap destruction game that will test your shooting skills and keep you hooked for hours!

Are you ready to be the number 1 sharp shooter?

- 100,000 levels to unlock
- 50 guns
- Unlock mini games to test your shooting skills
- Cool POWER-UPS
- Gun turrets with upgrades
